org.smartfrog.sfcore.common
Interface Tags

All Known Subinterfaces:
ComponentDescription, Context, Phases, SFComponentDescription
All Known Implementing Classes:
ComponentDescriptionImpl, ContextImpl, SFComponentDescriptionImpl
public interface Tags

Interface that defines the access to, and manipulation of, tags in contexts, component descriptions and (in its remote form) prims.

Method Summary

sfSetTags

void sfSetTags(java.lang.Object name,
               java.util.Set tags)
               throws SmartFrogContextException
Set the TAGS for an attribute. TAGS are simply uninterpreted strings associated with each attribute.

Parameters:
name - attribute key for tags
tags - a set of tags
Throws:
SmartFrogContextException - the attribute does not exist;
